title: An R6 class to assess a model with one metric versus another. — Ass2d
code: Ass2d$new(   x_metric,   y_metric,   benchmark = NULL,   file = NULL,   ci_level = 0.95,   fellow_csv = FALSE,   scores_plot = FALSE,   show_plots = FALSE,   title = NULL,   x_lab = NULL,   y_lab = NULL,   xlim = c(-Inf, Inf),   ylim = c(-Inf, Inf),   smooth_method = NULL,   smooth_benchmark = FALSE,   smooth_se = FALSE,   scale_x = "identity",   scale_y = "identity",   vline = NULL,   hline = NULL,   text_size = 2.5,   text = NULL,   alpha = 0.5,   width = 7,   height = 4,   colors = NULL,   theme = NULL,   units = "in",   dpi = 300 )

title: An R6 class to assess a model with one metric versus another. — Ass2d
text: x_metric string. name performance measure plotted x-axis. measures can passed x.measure parameter ROCR::performance() valid. y_metric string. name performance measure plotted y-axis. measures can passed measure parameter ROCR::performance() valid. "logrank" p-values logrank test. case, x_metric must "prevalence" "rpp". "precision_ci" lower bound ci_level (see ) confidence interval precision according Clopper-Pearson. benchmark string. Incorporate benchmark (pheno data) assessment benchmark NULL. file string. NULL, store resulting plot file. ci_level numeric [0, 1]. level used calculate confidence intervals. fellow_csv logical. Whether also store plotted data csv including cutoffs. scores_plot logical. Display ordered scores output model scatter plot. show_plots logical. Whether show plots creation interactive graphics device. title string. title plot. Default NULL, .e. title. x_lab, y_lab string. Axis labels. Default x_metric y_metric, respectively. xlim, ylim numeric vector length 2. limits axes. Default contraints. smooth_method string function. Smooth method plot additional smoothed graph. NULL (default), smoothing. Else pass smooth_method method parameter ggplot2::geom_smooth(). smooth_benchmark logical. Whether also smooth benchmark data. smooth_se logical. Whether add standard error bands smoothed lines. scale_x, scale_y string transformation object (see scales::trans_new latter). scale axes, pass trans paramter ggplot2::scale_x_continuous(), ggplot2::scale_y_continuous(), respectively. vline, hline list NULL. Vertical/horizontal lines added plot. list holding arguments pass ggplot2::geom_vline() ggplot2::geom_hline(), respectively. Default NULL, line. text_size numeric. size text passed size parameter ggplot2::geom_text(). reason attribute exists might want text size different global text size plot. See vignette("ggplot2-specs",  package = "ggplot2") details. text list NULL. Text label added plot. list holding arguments pass ggplot2::geom_label(). Default NULL, text . alpha numeric [0, 1]. alpha value points lines plot. width numeric. width plot units. height numeric. height plot units. colors character vector. colors used different models. Default NULL, means default colors ggplot2 used. theme S3 object inheriting "theme" "gg" (typically return value ggplot2::theme() complete ggplot2 theme like ggplot2::theme_light()). theme plot. Default NULL, means default theme ggplot2. units string. units width height. Default "" (inches). dpi numeric. Plot resolution dots per inch. pivot_time_cutoff numeric. Time--event threshold divides samples high/low-risk (time event /pivot_time_cutoff) group. Model performance measured terms well can separate two groups binary classifier.

title: An R6 class to assess a model with a scalar metric — AssScalar
text: metrics character. Assess model metrics. currently offered choices see "Usage" . model non-binary output (like logistic regression), choose threshold maximizing left-metric metrics made classifiers binary output (often "accuracy"). done reasonably (e.g., "precision" usually give high threshold low prevalence), throw error. prev_range numeric numeric vector length 2. metrics need thresholding consider thresholds yield prevalence range. benchmark character NULL. NULL, include benchmark (name column pheno data) assessment. file string NULL. name csv file save results train cohort. results saved. round_digits numeric. number digits round results . Default 3.

title: An R6 class for the data — Data
text: name string. telling name data set (e.g. "Schmitz et al. 2018"). directory string. directory expression pheno csv files lie. train_prop numeric (0, 1). proportion samples draw training cohort every splitting run. pivot_time_cutoff numeric. Pivotal time cutoff analysis , explicitly, splitting data train test cohort: numeric (0, 1), preserve proportion individuals time_cutoff cohorts. Default NULL, .e. constraints splitting. time_to_event_col string. name column pheno data holds time--event values. event_col string. name column pheno data holds event status encoded 1 = occurrence, 0 = censoring. benchmark_col string NULL. name column pheno data holds benchmark risk score (like IPI). cohort string c("train", "test") NULL. cohort, train test, prepare data . NULL, default, functions set (e.g. training_camp() "train", assess_2d() "test"), others throw error. expr_file string. name expression csv file inside directory. Default "expr.csv". See details expected format. pheno_file string. name pheno data csv inside directory. Default "pheno.csv". See details expected format. patient_id_col string. name column pheno data holds patient identifiers. gene_id_col string. name column expression data holds gene identifiers. split_col_prefix string. Column-name prefix columns holding splits train test cohort. columns may present pheno data already, others added training process required. Default "split_", .e., split columns named "split_1", "split_2", etc. imputer function NULL. Function handling NAs predictor matrix. takes single argument x, predictor matrix, numeric categorical variables dichotomized binary dummy variables, returns matrix shape non-NAs left untouched. predicting features.

title: An R6 class for a model — Model
text: name string. telling name model. fitter function. model fitting function used. Must take x y first two positional arguments. arguments can passed via hyperparams (). return value must S3 object plot() method, (ideally, assessment) predict() method. Default NULL. directory string. directory store models . every value time_cutoffs, find corresponding model subdirectory named value. split_index integer vector. Split given data training test samples length(split_index) times, .e., every index split_index get split. time_cutoffs numeric vector. governs provided response looks like. every value time_cutoffs, specify model following response data: Cox response, censor patients event ouccured time_cutoffs value train specified model. binary response, binarize outcome depending whether occured value. fitting models data, find every length(time_cutoffs) models subdirectory directory named respective value time_cutoffs. hyperparams list. Optional arguments passed fitter, e.g. alpha case elastic net. Default list(), .e., arguments x, y passed fitter. response_colnames string vector length 2. Column names Cox response matrix. first element name column holding time event censoring, second one anme column holding event status (1 = event, 0 = censoring). include_from_continuous_pheno vector strings. names continuous variables pheno data () included predictor matrix. values coerced numeric. Default NULL, means continuous pheno variables included. include_from_discrete_pheno vector strings. names discrete variables pheno data () included predictor matrix. discrete variable n levels converted n-1 binary variables. Default NULL, means discrete pheno variables included. include_expr logical. Whether include expression data predictor matrix. li_var_suffix string. Append names features pheno data adding predictor matrix. Default "++". create_directory logical. Whether create directory exist, yet. Default TRUE. plot_file string. Store plot resulting plot(fit_obj) directory name. Default "training_error.pdf". plot_ncols integer. number columns plot. Default 2. plot_title_line numeric NULL. Pass line argument graphics::title() calling plot(fit_obj). distance (inches) title text upper limit figure. Default 2.5. fit_file string. name model-fits file inside directory. Default "fit_obj.rds". continuous_output logical NULL. Whether output model continous (like conditional probabilities logistic regression) binary (like random forest). piece information helpful comes assessing model (Ass2d$assess_center() uses , e.g.). combine_n_max_categorical_features integer. Maximum number categorical features combine predicting features. combined_feature_min_positive_ratio numeric. Minimum ratio positive observations combined (categorical) feature. attribute together combine_n_max_categorical_features governs combinatorial features predicitor matrix contain.

Binary response. y_cox Named numeric matrix two columns. first column time event, second column indicates censoring (1 event, 0 censored). fitter1 patroklos-compliant fitter CV tuning (see README details). fitter2 patroklos-compliant fitter validated predictions (see README details). returns "next", skip current combination hyperparameters set metric -Inf. hyperparams1 named list hyperparaters pass fitter1. hyperparams2 named list hyperparameters late model. Unlike hyperparams1, call fitter2 every combination values hyperparams2 lambda value fitter1.

Note predictions get nested model predictions one observe independent test samples: fix sample . get OOB/CV prediction sample models/ model whose training algorithm see sample . probably saw prediction sample j != according early model whose training algorithm seen sample . Hence term "pseudo" name function. heuristic saves factor n_folds computation time compared full nested cross-validation.
